question: Which Department has launched a new initiative called ‘Jhatpat Processing’?
option1: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade
explanation:
The Income Tax Department, headed by the Central Board of Direct Taxes, has introduced a new initiative called, 'Jhatpat Processing'.
The aim of the initiative is to smoothen the experience of Income Tax return filing for taxpayers. Tutorial videos of the procedure to file ITR1 and ITR4 were also shared by the Department. Last date for filing income tax for taxpayers not requiring audit is December 31, 2020.
